thread.title: Luol Deng veut quitter les Lakers
thread.title_full: Luol Deng veut quitter les Lakers

posts.author: Samuel Hauraix
posts.title: Luol Deng veut quitter les Lakers
posts.text:
Par Samuel Hauraix   8:48 Tweeter 
Avec la blessure de Larry Nance Jr., Luke Walton a préféré compenser cette absence en titularisant le rookie Kyle Kuzma. Plutôt que de faire appel à Luol Deng, pourtant bouche-trou officieux des Lakers , titularisé le tout premier match de la saison avec la suspension de Kentavious Caldwell-Pope. Nance out, Deng n’a pas récupéré le moindre minute depuis cette première rentrée. 
Résultat, après seulement une dizaine de matches joués par les Lakers, le vétéran montre déjà des signes d’agacement. 
« C’est vraiment blessant, lâche le plaintif à ESPN . Mais la seule réponse pour moi maintenant est de faire mes preuves ailleurs qu’à Los Angeles. On ne me demande pas de jouer, je ne suis pas dans la rotation, je ne peux rien prouver ici. » 
Deng a été signé au prix d’or il y a un an, comme Timofey Mozgov, pour jouer un rôle de mentor auprès des jeunes Lakers. « Ce n’est pas forcément la situation idéale et ce pourquoi j’ai signé », rappelle l’anglo-soudanais. Car aujourd’hui, il ne semble plus question pour lui de jouer au modèle pour les jeunes. 
« La plupart d’entre eux ne comprennent pas le business autour du basket, alors en venant ici, je suis en colère chaque jour. Je dois être souriant, être dans le meilleur esprit possible, parce qu’ils vivent leur rêve d’être des joueurs NBA. » Trade ou buyout ? 
Deng ne compte donc pas aller au bout de son contrat de quatre ans et 72 millions de dollars, signé durant l’été 2016. Son agent et lui ont indiqué chercher une solution de sortie : un transfert ou le buyout. L’un des enjeux est de savoir quand cette issue sera trouvée ? « Je ne sais pas, ça peut être un mois, une semaine, trois mois », rétorque Deng qui rappelle n’avoir jamais été, dans sa carrière, le genre de joueur à créer du remous dans une équipe. 
L’autre grosse interrogation est de savoir quelle équipe voudrait s’offrir ce joueur de 32 ans dont la cote est au plus bas. Luol Deng

posts.title: Global Fatty Methyl Ester Sulfonate Market 2017-2021: Boosted by Rising Demand for Personal Care Products - Research and Markets
posts.text:
Global Fatty Methyl Ester Sulfonate Market 2017-2021: Boosted by Rising Demand for Personal Care Products - Research and Markets
The "Global Fatty Methyl Ester Sulfonate Market 2017-2021" report has been added to Research and Markets' offering.
The global fatty methyl ester sulfonate market is expected to grow at a CAGR of 18.7% during the period 2017-2021.
The report has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers the market landscape and its growth prospects over the coming years. The report also includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market.
The latest trend gaining momentum in the market is the rising demand for personal care products. Fatty methyl ester sulfonate is used in the production of personal care and cosmetic products. It is used as an active ingredient in the production of shampoos, shower, soaps, shaving creams, hair oils, and lotions. The increase in the demand for fatty methyl ester sulfonate from the personal care industry is due to its cost-effective raw materials and easy extractable technique. The rising concern for the side-effects caused by synthetic cosmetic products is leading to a shift in the preference of consumers toward cosmetics made from natural resources. The increase in the demand for personal care products, such as hand wash, fabric cleaners, and stain removers, is resulting in the increase in the demand for fatty methyl ester sulfonate because of its high biodegradability and non-toxicity.
According to the report, one of the major drivers for this market is fatty methyl ester sulfonate as a substitute for alkyl benzene surfactant. Fatty methyl ester sulfonate is synthesized by the esterification and sulfonation of vegetable oils. It is made from renewable resources, such as palm oil and coconut oil. It is used in the production of detergents and surfactants. It is completely biodegradable and less toxic compared to other synthetic detergents. Alkyl benzene surfactant is derived from linear alkylbenzene (LAB). Methyl ester sulfonate surfactants are used extensively in laundry detergents and in industries for cleaning machinery. There are many advantages of methyl ester sulfonate surfactants over alkylbenzene surfactants in terms of production, sustainability, and toxic effects.

posts.author: 责任编辑：程钢_NN7377
posts.title: 惊魂！海口这辆出租车顶灯突现"我被打劫，请报警"_网易新闻
posts.text:
（原标题：惊魂！大白天海口街头这辆出租车顶灯突然出现“我被打劫，请报警” ）
出租车我们都是经常坐的，
你会发现
一般出租车顶灯上都是滚动广告
但是
有这么一辆出租车顶灯突然出现
“我被打劫 请报警”
到底发生了什么事呢?
今日，有网友在朋友圈上传一张照片称，在海口街头看到一辆出租车车顶的LED屏幕上滚动出现“我被打劫 请报警”的字样。记者了解情况后立即将此事反映给了海口市交通运输和港航管理局。原来，是该出租车司机不小心误触车内报警装置，所以有了这场乌龙事件。
网友报料：
海口街头一出租车遭抢劫
据网友介绍，今日下午4时左右，他在海口街头看到一辆车牌号为“琼A41xxx”的出租车，该车车顶的LED显示屏上，一直滚动显示着一行字：“我被打劫，请报警!”网友拍照将图片上传到朋友圈，并声称已报警了，引起大家关注。记者随即将情况反映给了海口市交通运输和港航管理局。
经海口市交通港航综合执法支队的工作人员调取车辆GPS发现，今日下午4时6分，该出租车未启用计价器，也就是说，当时该车处于空车状态。但是，依然无法确定车上是否有乘客。随后，海口市交通信息中心的工作人员在海口海府路一带定位到该出租车，并锁定车辆联系司机。
▲海口交通信息中心定位该车的位置
出租车公司：
司机误触，车辆已召回检修
当联系上该出租车司机后，交通信息中的工作人员哭笑不得，原来真是一场乌龙事件。因为司机误触了出租车的报警按钮，导致车顶LED屏幕上显示报警信息。随后，记者也与该司机取得了联系，了解到“闹乌龙”出租车所属公司为海南侨商事业有限公司。据该公司负责人吕先生介绍，这种事情在出租车行业很常见，因为公司每台出租车上都设有报警装置，连接着车顶上的LED屏幕，而报警按钮就在方向盘附近，以便司机遇紧急情况快速报警。
“司机不小心按到按钮，车顶LED屏就会自动显示‘我被打劫，请报警!’字样，同时还会将报警信息传至公安局和交通局。有时候司机去洗车，洗车师傅也会误触报警按钮，车顶LED屏就显示这句话，把洗车师傅都吓一跳。”吕先生说，为了避免再次引起恐慌，目前该辆出租车已被召回进行检修。
本文来源：海南特区报 责任编辑：程钢_NN7377 分享到： 易信 微信 QQ空间 微博 更多 用微信扫码二维码

thread.title: De nivel preparatoria las adolescentes que más se embarazan
thread.title_full: De nivel preparatoria las adolescentes que más se embarazan

posts.author: Mariela Pulgarín
posts.title: De nivel preparatoria las adolescentes que más se embarazan
posts.text:
Inicio Piedras Negras De nivel preparatoria las adolescentes que más se embarazan De nivel preparatoria las adolescentes que más se embarazan Por - 7 noviembre, 2017 
Piedras Negras, Coah.- El índice de embarazos en adolescentes continúa en un 38 por ciento, y ahora el mayor impacto esta en jovencitas de 16 años (nivel preparatoria), cuanto antes era alrededor de los 14 años de edad (nivel secundaria). 
“Habíamos tenido un pico hace unos cuatro o cinco años, que se presentaban mucho en adolescentes de secundaria, ahora hay descenso y sigue mantenido embarazos en adolescentes de preparatoria”, mencionó Minerva Contreras. 
La coordinadora del departamento de Salud Reproductiva de la Jurisdicción Sanitaria 1, indicó que una de las principales razones que no utilizan los anticonceptivos es por vergüenza u ocultar que tienen relaciones sexuales. 
“Tratamos de llegar a los jóvenes para brindar acceso de métodos anticonceptivos, que sepan donde los pueden conseguir, que sepan que tiene acceso totalmente gratuito de métodos anticonceptivos, para cuidarse de enfermedades de trasmisión sexual o embarazo”. Compartir

posts.author: きょうこ
posts.title: 満たされる～
posts.text:
今日のお昼は贅沢にも
お寿司屋さんの

仕出し弁当！
お客さんから差し入れで頂いてしまったの。

ここの “お稲荷さん” がおススメ！ とかで
レンコンやゴマが入っていたのよ。
美味しかった( ´∀｀ )




雑用で始まり雑用で終わった一日だったね。 
夕焼け！ 


ウインドウに映り込んだ夕焼け！




雑用で終わったかもしれないけど、
相変わらずアニメファンの若者は来てくれるのよね。
彼らからの気持ちのこもった品々で


店内だけでなく



心も満たされる～～






あっ、

もうそろそろ、

私だけが密かに（笑）
愛でていたスケッチブックを

公開しようかな。
アニメファンの子達って絵の上手な方が多いのよ。
話してる中で 「絵を描くのが好きで・・・」 
なんて聞いちゃうと
思わず勧誘して描いてもらっているのよ。
すでに２冊目に入っているから
そろそろ公開時期よね。
１２月に入ったら考えよっと！

thread.title: Se detectan empresas que extraen material pétreo
thread.title_full: Se detectan empresas que extraen material pétreo

posts.author: Héctor Guerrero
posts.title: Se detectan empresas que extraen material pétreo
posts.text:
Inicio Piedras Negras Se detectan empresas que extraen material pétreo Se detectan empresas que extraen material pétreo Por 7 noviembre, 2017 Solo cuatro empresas las que explotan el material pétreo del río San Rodrigo. 
Al menos tres empresas han sido detectadas extrayendo material pétreo del río San Rodrigo y retirados del lugar y con procesos abiertos, confirmó Raúl Tamez Robledo. 
El delegado de la Secretaría de Medio Ambiente y Recursos Naturales (SEMARNAT) en Coahuila, aseguró que han ido regularizando esta situación, debido a denuncias hechas por residentes del ejido El Moral y la asociación civil “Amigos del río San Rodrigo”. 
Sin embargo, reconoció que hay otras cuatro empresas con concesiones vigentes que están trabajando actualmente. 
Dos de los hermanos Martínez del Moral, Agregados de Calidad y Material San Rodrigo. 
Tamez Robledo dijo que la Conagua está monitoreando la extracción de material pétreo para tener volúmenes exactos, una revisión que se realiza desde junio a la fecha. – 
“Lo que está haciendo la Secretaría es exhortar a los concesionarios a que busquen lugares alternos para explotar el material y que se permita la recuperación del río. 
Las vigencias de concesiones de las empresas terminan en 2021 y 2023. Compartir

thread.title: Diverse perspectives complete innovative lineup for DIFF's MUHR short competition
thread.title_full: Diverse perspectives complete innovative lineup for DIFF's MUHR short competition

posts.title: Diverse perspectives complete innovative lineup for DIFF's MUHR short competition
posts.text:
Diverse perspectives complete innovative lineup for DIFF's MUHR short competition Press Release Dubai - The Dubai International Film Festival (DIFF) has revealed the final eight films that will complete the 2017 Muhr Short lineup. The completed 15-strong competition segment brings a diverse range of work to the 14th Festival, running from 6 – 13 December. Aside from the honour of the award itself, the renowned competition will offer a once-in-a lifetime opportunity for one talented 15 regional short films in contention for a chance to be considered for 2019 Oscars 
Dubai - The Dubai International Film Festival (DIFF) has revealed the final eight films that will complete the 2017 Muhr Short lineup. The completed 15-strong competition segment brings a diverse range of work to the 14 th Festival, running from 6 – 13 December. Aside from the honour of the award itself, the renowned competition will offer a once-in-a lifetime opportunity for one talented director, as the winning short film will qualify for 2019 Oscar consideration. 
‘Blue Fly Road’ from acclaimed Syrian filmmaker Bassam Chekhes will make its world premiere at DIFF . Having won hearts with his 2012 short ‘Waiting for P.O. Box’ , Chekhes returns to DIFF with a story of two brothers. Nine-year-old Ibrahim lives alone in the forest; everyday he waits for his twin brother, Abdulla, to bring him food and water. One day they switch places, so Ibrahim can wonder through the blue fly road for the first time. Joining Chekhes is DIFF veteran and multidisciplinary artist Hicham Lasri, with the world premiere of his latest short ‘City Soul’ . Following successful festival campaigns for ‘The End’ , ‘They Are the Dogs’ and ‘Starve Your Dog’ , ‘City Soul’ follows a young child who wanders the roads of Casablanca’s metropolis. A lone figure in an overwhelming city, the child aims to capture its soul through the reflections of its narrow streets, boulevards and inhabitants. Dark and light of the ancient city come to the fore, made tender and soft through the child’s eyes and the audience witnesses as the beauty of Casablanca emerges.
Making her debut at DIFF is first-time Egyptian filmmaker Noha Adelwith the world premiere of her short film ‘Into Reverse’ . It is a typical morning in Cairo, until a chance encounter between two drivers erupts into hostility on a crowded one-way street. A confrontation between the two drivers follows: a raging, angry man and a frightened but determined woman. Despite having right of way, will the female driver submit just because she is a woman? Advertisement Marking his third appearance at the Festival is celebrated Palestinian-Jordanian filmmaker Ameen Nayfeh with the world premiere of ‘The Crossing’. Shady and his sister Maryam are excited to visit their sick grandfather on the other side of the wall. Their elder brother Mohammed quickly arrives with the permit to let them cross. They arrive at the checkpoint. However, sometimes even having a permit is not enough to let people pass. 
Acclaimed Lebanese director and screenwriter Cyril Aris returns to DIFF, with his latest short film, ‘The President’s Visit’ after winning an award at DIFF 2016 for ‘Submarine’ which he produced. ‘The President’s Visit’ ,which premiered at the Toronto International Film Festival earlier this year, follows fishermen in a small coastal town. When the men learn about the secret visit from their President to one of their local shops they set off on a major cleanup to keep-up their town’s perfect image. 
Joining Aris is Lebanese filmmaker Feyrouz Serhal with her debut short ‘Tshweesh’ , which premiered at the Locarno International Film Festival this year as well as being screened at Busan International Film Festival. Beirut waits with bated breath for the first match of the FIFA World Cup. Although life continues normally, the first match’s transmission is disrupted by strange audio waves. The frustration over the telecast builds up and gives way to a larger, live event. 
Lebanese filmmaker Talal Khoury, known for artistic shorts such as ‘Muscles’ and ‘Monday’ , brings the world premiere of his latest work, ‘Mediterranean’ . It takes only four to six minutes for a human to drown. This is now a frequent occurrence in the Mediterranean Sea, as people risk everything in order to flee the brutality of war. Audiences are invited to meet the blue waters that are constantly swallowing people, while the world watches. 
The world premiere of ‘When the Sky Began to Scream’ , from Tunisian writer and director Kays Mejri, will complete the Muhr Short lineup. The dark thrilling short finds Samy and Lilya on a forgotten road far from the city, the film takes a dramatic turn when they are confronted by a group of gravediggers with bad intentions for Lilya and her unborn child. 
Masoud Amralla Al Ali, DIFF’s Director, commented: “The filmmakers in the Muhr Short category never fail to impress us with their creative insights and captivating storytelling. It is testament to the imagination and talent across the Arab World that each year we see directors tackle universal themes through the demanding medium of short film, and receive international recognition for their endeavours.” 
DIFF’s Programmer, Salah Sermini, added: “The Muhr Short category is an integral and longstanding part of DIFF’s commitment to showcasing the best in Arab cinema, and has showcased a vast array of filmmaking talent from across the region. Producing a short film is no easy task due to the limited resources and time that define the category, but we are as amazed as ever of the creativity offered in this year’s lineup and look forward to sharing them this December.” 
Ticket packages are on sale now for the 14 th edition of the Dubai International Film Festival which will take place from 6 – 13 December, 2017. For more information on the packages and registration for media, students and industry professionals, visit the DIFF website at www.diff.ae. 
-Ends-

thread.title: Dubai Design Week displays the best of design from the MENASA region with return of popular Abwab exhibition
thread.title_full: Dubai Design Week displays the best of design from the MENASA region with return of popular Abwab exhibition

posts.title: Dubai Design Week displays the best of design from the MENASA region with return of popular Abwab exhibition
posts.text:
Article #leisure | 07 November, 2017 Dubai Design Week displays the best of design from the MENASA region with return of popular Abwab exhibition Press Release Dubai, UAE - Held under the Patronage of Her Highness Sheikha Latifa bint Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, in partnership with Dubai Design District (d3), Dubai Design Week’s popular exhibition Abwab will return to this year’s programme. The pavilion will house a showcase of emerging design talent from the Middle East, North Africa and South Asia (MENASA). Abwab-which translates into 13-18 November 2017
47 regional designers from 15 countries contribute to the Abwab exhibition through product, furniture, tableware, lighting, textile, graphic and typeface design 
The works on display were collected through a unique peer-nomination process coined 'designer dominos' resulting in over 100 submissions that were shortlisted by an acclaimed editorial board 
The impressive pavilion, designed by Fahed + Architects, which houses these regional emerging designers will be constructed using recovered bedsprings Dubai, UAE - Held under the Patronage of Her Highness Sheikha Latifa bint Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, in partnership with Dubai Design District (d3), Dubai Design Week’s popular exhibition Abwab will return to this year’s programme. The pavilion will house a showcase of emerging design talent from the Middle East, North Africa and South Asia (MENASA). Abwab-which translates into ‘doors’ in Arabic- invites audiences into the diverse design scenes of regional creative industries. Rawan Kashkoush, Creative Director of Abwab and Dubai Design Week’s Head of Programming says: “Abwab is an architectural undertaking to house design works from a burgeoning creative community spanning across three regions that share Dubai as an anchor, the exhibition looks to momentarily bridge these faraway places through design.”Situated within the outdoor corridors of d3, the Abwab pavilion has been designed by Dubai-based architectural studio Fahed + Architects. The structure will be constructed using borrowed and repurposed bedsprings from waste management company Bee’ah. Set against the large mass of buildings, the structure will appear as a coral cluster in a reef. Inspired by the lightness of nature, the bedsprings act as a coil mesh, distilling daylight to reveal patterns on the exhibited works and the ground around the structure.Fahed Majeed, Founder & Chief Architect of Fahed + Architects says: “The Abwab pavilion, an embodiment of hope, highlights the most relevant value - reuse and recycle, while setting new benchmarks in unconventional design. The structure is designed as a contemporary and inviting space that enables it to be perceived as an artistic expression."The regional design talents on display were selected by a high-profile international editorial board comprising of Joy Mardini, Director of JM Design Gallery; Design Commentator, Max Fraser; Sheikha Lateefa bint Maktoum, Founder and Director of Tashkeel; and Rawan Kashkoush, Creative Director of Abwab. The exhibition will host 47 design objects from 15 countries selected through a process requiring designers to nominate the next designer to submit; coined ‘designer dominos’ with the intention of celebrating the regional design communities. Through this process, a total of 250 designers were reached and 99 submissions received.The shortlisted works were found to reflect strong cultural roots or local production techniques. A strong trend in material investigation and reinterpretation of production techniques was visible in many of the submissions, showing an exciting growth in design production. Among the pieces on display it was found that the top three objects produced in MENASA are chairs, lights and vessels/bowls. Designs from the UAE, Lebanon and Morroco were the most popular, followed by works from Egypt, India and Kuwait.Visitors of the exhibition will experience a curatorial journey through the pieces by way of eight groups that link from one to the next; interpretation, intersection, geometry, mimicry, tactility, artisanal, nostalgia and re-use linking back to interpretation and so on. For the first time, the objects on show will be available for purchase throughout the week.For a full list of the selected works visit: http://www.dubaidesignweek.ae/projects/abwab-2017/ © Press Release 2017

thread.title: His Excellency Abdul Aziz Al Ghurair Receives Cal Poly Alumni Excellence Award
thread.title_full: His Excellency Abdul Aziz Al Ghurair Receives Cal Poly Alumni Excellence Award

posts.title: His Excellency Abdul Aziz Al Ghurair Receives Cal Poly Alumni Excellence Award
posts.text:
His Excellency Abdul Aziz Al Ghurair Receives Cal Poly Alumni Excellence Award Press Release Dubai, United Arab Emirates – His Excellency Abdul Aziz Al Ghurair, CEO of Mashreq Bank is the inaugural recipient of the Cal Poly Alumni Excellence Award presented by the California Polytechnic State University Alumni Association at the Honored Alumni Awards Celebration. Established in 2017, the Cal Poly Alumni Excellence Award pays tribute to an outstanding graduate who has demonstrated a 
Dubai, United Arab Emirates – His Excellency Abdul Aziz Al Ghurair, CEO of Mashreq Bank is the inaugural recipient of the Cal Poly Alumni Excellence Award presented by the California Polytechnic State University Alumni Association at the Honored Alumni Awards Celebration. Established in 2017, the Cal Poly Alumni Excellence Award pays tribute to an outstanding graduate who has demonstrated a lifetime of professional achievements and global contributions. 
“I’m very proud of His Excellency’s accomplishments,” Cal Poly President Jeffrey D. Armstrong said. “He’s served as the Chair of Federal National Council in UAE, that’s roughly equivalent to being the Speaker of the House in the U.S. House of Representatives, and currently he serves as Chairman of the Banking Federation for the UAE.” His Excellency is a 1977 graduate in industrial engineering from the California Polytechnic State University. While at university, he was a committed student leader, serving as Chairman of the Cal Poly Muslim Students Association and Arab Student Association. He returned to campus for the first time since graduating in 1977 to accept the award. 
“It’s an emotional moment for me, visiting Cal Poly after such a long time and I feel honored by this award,” His Excellency said. Advertisement His Excellency is the CEO of Mashreq Bank, the largest private sector bank in the United Arab Emirates and the Chairman of the Board’s Executive Committee of Al Ghurair Investment LLC, one of the largest and most successful business groups in the Middle East. In 2012 he was appointed the Chairman of the UAE Banking Federation, representing 49 member banks operating in the UAE. His current positions include Vice Chairman of the Higher Board of Dubai International Financial Centre (DIFC), and the Board of Emirates Foundation, among many others. 
He is passionate about his role as Chairman of the Abdulla Al Ghurair Foundation for Education. The Foundation was established by his father, Abdulla Al Ghurair a renowned businessman, who in 2015 decided to dedicate one third of his wealth to the Foundation, in order to help Emirati and Arab youth reach their full potential through access to quality education. 
“We had a desire and a vision to help our nation and region and we thought education was the most critical need that would have the most lasting impact on the individual, their families, and their communities,” H.E. Abdul Aziz Al Ghurair said of the foundation. 
Among his many accomplishments, H.E. Abdul Aziz Al Ghurair was named Banking Business Leader of the Year in 2016 & 2017 and Innovator of the Year in 2014 by Gulf Business. He has been recognized for his commitment to more than 3,000 employees at Mashreq Bank and Mashreq has been awarded the Gallup Award from 2014-2016. 
“I give credit for what I have been able to achieve to the foundation that Cal Poly gave me,” His Excellency said. 
-Ends-

thread.title: Fly Baghdad Airlines launched flights to Amman Queen Alia International Airport
thread.title_full: Fly Baghdad Airlines launched flights to Amman Queen Alia International Airport

posts.title: Fly Baghdad Airlines launched flights to Amman Queen Alia International Airport
posts.text:
Fly Baghdad Airlines launched flights to Amman Queen Alia International Airport Press Release Fly Baghdad, the first low cost airlines in Iraq, launched their first flights to Jordanian capital Amman on the second of this month. 
Baghdad - Fly Baghdad, the first low cost airlines in Iraq, launched their first flights to the Jordanian capital Amman on the second of this month, which represents new step in the way to enhance their network of international flights. 
Fly Baghdad flight took off from Baghdad International Airport heading to Amman, and was welcomed by water cannon salute in Queen Alia International Airport . This was followed by well-organized reception in the terminal and cake cutting ceremony. The reception was attended by the airport management and staff, the Head and management of the ground handling company, the General sales agent, Petra Travel & Tourism, and representatives of the travel and tourism companies in Jordan. From Fly Baghdad side, it was attended by the Chairman, the CEO, the Sales Manager, and the flight crew. Fly Baghdad their Amman route with four flights a week, to become daily flights within two months.
Fly Baghdad Passengers can book their tickets directly from the company's website www.flybaghdad.net , addition to booking through the call centre and travel agents in Iraq and the destination countries. Advertisement Amman inaugural flight comes a few days from starting Istanbul route on October 28, and it’s in line with Fly Baghdad’s growth plan that aims to expand the number of international destinations to meet the needs of the Iraqi travel market, by offering new destinations at competitive prices.
About Fly Baghdad Company Is privately owned airline, which was launched in 2015. Then was bought by Iraqi businessmen, and was restructured by the new management, which announced their new strategy in September 2016 as a scheduled Low-cost airline. In 14 th of February 2017 was re-launched as the first low-cost airline in Iraq with the slogan "Low Price ... More Flights". The aim of Fly Baghdad is to create successful airline that complies with the international aviation standards, and to meet the needs of passengers flying into and from Iraq, and contribute to the strength of the Iraqi economy, as well as enhance the level of air transportation in Iraq and the region based on the experience of their new management 
© Press Release 2017

thread.title: MOÇAMBIQUE: POPULARES DE TETE LINCHAM MAIS UM CIDADÃO
thread.title_full: MOÇAMBIQUE: POPULARES DE TETE LINCHAM MAIS UM CIDADÃO

posts.author: Bambaram di Padida (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: MOÇAMBIQUE: POPULARES DE TETE LINCHAM MAIS UM CIDADÃO
posts.text:
Um indivíduo perdeu a vida vítima de linchamento, no sábado (04), na cidade de Tete, província com o mesmo nome, supostamente porque era ladrão, cometia assaltos a residências e semeava terror na comunidade. 
Segundo os protagonistas do acto, o malogrado foi apanhado a roubar bens numa casa na zona de Chimadzi, no bairro Mateus Sansão Mutemba. A forma com que o cidadão foi tirado a vida, a sangue frio, é a mesma de sempre, tortura física , que num primeiro instante visava alegadamente persuadir a vítima confessar o crime de que era acusado. 
Como tem sido costume neste tipo de situações, nenhum cidadão foi preso pela Polícia da República de Moçambique (PRM), que disse estar a encetar diligências no sentido de recolher aos calabouços os mentores do acto. 
Não é primeira vez que populares em Tete matam seus semelhantes. Em Outubro passado, a PRM deteve, no distrito de Macanga, três cidadãos por alegado linchamento de igual número de líderes comunitários, acusados de feitiçaria. 
Os visados faziam parte de um grupo de populares que também procurava fazer justiça pelas próprias mãos. Em Setembro, outro grupo de populares enfurecidos tentou linchar dois presumíveis ladrões e assassinos de três pessoas no distrito de Chiúta, 
http://www.verdade.co.mz

thread.title: Rekindling takes out the 2017 Emirates Melbourne Cup
thread.title_full: Rekindling takes out the 2017 Emirates Melbourne Cup

posts.title: Rekindling takes out the 2017 Emirates Melbourne Cup
posts.text:
Rekindling takes out the 2017 Emirates Melbourne Cup Press Release Run over 3200 metres, the Emirates Melbourne Cup offers the richest prize in Australian sport and a 18ct solid gold trophy 
Melbourne, Australia - True to its reputation as ‘the race that stops a nation’™ the Emirates Melbourne Cup has once again delivered an incredible result for trainer Joseph O’Brien, with jockey Corey Brown riding to victory in an outstanding finish. 
Run over 3200 metres, the Emirates Melbourne Cup offers the richest prize in Australian sport and a 18ct solid gold trophy valued at $200,000. Barry Brown, Emirates’ Divisional Vice President for Australasia, presented the Emirates Melbourne Cup to the winning connections of of Rekindling, which is owned by N C Williams, Mr & Mrs L J Williams, A L & B A Green, B N Singer, P Mehrten, J & Mrs F Ingham, M Gudinski, V Sammartino, G T Ryan, Bulla Thoroughbreds and Heffernan Bloodstock. 
“Year-on-year, the iconic Emirates Melbourne Cup celebrates the magic of racing and 2017 has been no exception. The Emirates Melbourne Cup race takes race-goers on a journey, one that captivates from the moment the gates open until the winning horse crosses the finish line,” said Mr Brown. Advertisement “This incredible race provides the opportunity to connect people from around the globe, which is at the core of Emirates. The Emirates Melbourne Cup is truly a spectacular event with a history of iconic moments and is now firmly placed on the international sporting stage.”
While Australians around the country celebrated the race, Emirates entertained special guest and international model Lara Stone, as well as a number of well-known Australian celebrities and sports figures including Paralympic gold medalist Dylan Alcott, singer Guy Sebastian, and radio and television figure Dave Hughes. 
The heads of Australian business and politics also celebrated the moment in the Emirates marquee, including Qantas CEO, Alan Joyce, Senator the Hon, Marise Payne and Flight Centre CEO, Graham Turner. 
This year, Emirates brought its signature First Class and Business Class luxury experience to life, allowing guests to journey through the clouds in an in-flight themed marquee. 
Inspired by a host of luxurious on-board features and key traits of Emirates’ A380 aircraft, guests in the marquee enjoyed gourmet cuisines from around the world in the Emirates restaurant, including Berber spice & lime cured ocean trout, braised chard & chevre ravioli and raspberry crème fraiche bavarois. 
Following an immersive interpretation of The Great Gatsby which saw the grandeur of the Roaring 20’s come to life, Emirates treated guests to the ‘James Steeth Cocktail’, created with lilet blanc infused with gold pearlescent powder, rhubarb and pear shrub, sugar syrup and Mumm Champagne, inspired by the iconic and grand Emirates Melbourne Cup trophy and served out of Emirates very own A380 Bar. 
Emirates Sommelier, Stephen Towler, also hosted an exclusive wine tasting for select guests, showcasing a refined selection of Emirates’ fine Australian wines including Levantine Hill Sauvignon Blanc, Mount Mary Pinot Noir and Penfolds RWT. 
© Press Release 2017

posts.author: Rongginn ITLTD (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: ইন্টারভিউ বোর্ডে যাওয়ার আগে নিজের সাজ
posts.text:
রঙিন ডেস্ক : ইন্টার্ভিউ দিতে গেলে নিজের সাজ-পোশাকের প্রতি অবশ্যই খেয়াল রাখবেন। চাকরি পাওয়ার ক্ষেত্রে আপনাকে সাহায্য করবে পরিপাটি পোশাক-আশাক এবং সজ্জা। ইন্টার্ভিউয়ের সময়ে পোশাক আশাক হতে হবে মার্জিত এবং ফর্মাল। ফর্মাল মানে এই নয় যে স্যুট-টাই পড়তে হবে। তবে ফর্মাল ধাঁচের শার্ট-প্যান্ট পরুন। মেয়েদের ক্ষেত্রে শাড়ি বা সালোয়ার কামিজ দুটোই চলনসই, তবে সাধারণত সালোয়ার-কামিজ পরাটাকে বেশি গ্রহণযোগ্য বলে মনে করা হয়। অলংকার এবং মেকআপের আতিশয্য বর্জন করলেই ভালো। প্রথম দেখাতেই যদি একটি মানুষকে মনে হয় গোছানো, স্মার্ট এবং নির্ভরশীল, তবে তার চাকরি পাওয়ার সম্ভাবনা যায় অনেকটা বেড়ে। শুধু তাই নয়, সুন্দর করে নিজেকে সাজানো-গোছানোর মাধ্যমে নিজের আত্মবিশ্বাসটিকেও শানিয়ে নেওয়া যায়। দেখে নিন ইন্টার্ভিউতে যাবার আগে নিজেকে প্রস্তুত করবার কিছু টিপস। চুল হতে হবে একদম সাধারণ 
– আগের দিন রাত্রেই চুল ধুয়ে শুকিয়ে রাখুন যাতে ইন্টার্ভিউয়ের দিন তাড়াহুড়ো করতে না হয়
– চুল যদি লম্বা হয় তবে একটি পনিটেইল করে নিতে পারেন
– অন্য সময়ে হেয়ার স্প্রে ব্যবহার না করলেও এই দিনে চুলকে অগোছালো হয়ে যাওয়া থেকে বাঁচাতে অল্প করে হেয়ার স্প্রে ব্যবহার করতে পারেন
– চুলে রঙচঙে ক্লিপ বা কাঁটা ব্যবহার করবেন না
– খেয়াল রাখুন চুল যেন কোনোভাবেই মুখের ওপর এসে না পড়ে মেকআপ যতো কম তত ভালো 
– অন্যদিনের চাইতে একটু বেশি সময় নিয়ে, ধৈর্য ধরে মেকআপ করুন
– হালকা করে ময়েশ্চারাইজার বা বিবি ক্রিম মাখুন মুখে
– চোখের নিচে লালচেভাব থাকলে অল্প করে কনসিলার দিয়ে ঢেকে ফেলুন
– আগের দিন রাত্রে ঠোঁট এক্সফলিয়েট করে রাখুন এবং ইন্টার্ভিউয়ের আগে লিপবাম ব্যবহার করুন
– এমনভাবে লিপস্টিক ব্যবহার করুন যাতে বোঝা না যায়, ভুলেও লিপ গ্লস ব্যবহার করবেন না
– নিউট্রাল এবং ন্যাচারাল শেডের আই শ্যাডো ব্যবহার করুন
– আপনি যদি ভ্রু সবসময় প্লাক করেন তবে অবশ্যই ইন্টার্ভিউয়ের আগে দেখে নেবেন নতুন করে প্লাক করার দরকার আছে কি না
– হাইলাইটার, কন্ট্যুর এসব করতে গেলে মেকআপ ভারী হয়ে যাবে, তাই এগুলো এড়িয়ে চলাই ভালো পারফিউমের ক্ষেত্রে মাত্র একটি নিয়ম
– কোনো পারফিউম ব্যবহার না করাই ভালো কারণ আপনার পারফিউম যদি ইন্টার্ভিউ বোর্ডের কারও অপছন্দ হয় তবে আপনার ব্যাপারে তার নেতিবাচক ধারণা তৈরি হয়ে যাবে নখের যত্নে কিছু টিপস– হাতের অবস্থা খুব খারাপ হয়ে থাকলে ম্যানিকিওর করে নিন– নখ বেশি লম্বা না হওয়াই ভালো– বেশি রঙচঙে নেইল পলিশ ব্যবহার করবেন না, একদম হালকা গোলাপি অথবা বেইজ ব্যবহার করুন

thread.title: Cluttons: Retail market expected to remain a bright spot in Bahrain's property market
thread.title_full: Cluttons: Retail market expected to remain a bright spot in Bahrain's property market

posts.title: Cluttons: Retail market expected to remain a bright spot in Bahrain's property market
posts.text: Cluttons: Retail market expected to remain a bright spot in Bahrain's property market Press Release Manama, Bahrain - With positive government interventions to bring in more investors and diversify Bahrain’s real estate market, retail remains a significant area of growth in the Kingdom’s property sector. The renewed confidence amongst retail occupiers and retail developers is especially reflected in the fact that retail rents have remained stable over the last six months, according to leading in Manama, Bahrain - With positive government interventions to bring in more investors and diversify Bahrain’s real estate market, retail remains a significant area of growth in the Kingdom’s property sector. The renewed confidence amongst retail occupiers and retail developers is especially reflected in the fact that retail rents have remained stable over the last six months, according to leading international real estate consultancy, Cluttons.Commenting on the Bahrain Winter 2017/18 Property Market Outlook, Faisal Durrani, Head of Research at Cluttons, said, “Retail is playing a central role in helping various areas in the Kingdom realise their full potential, with residential tenants being drawn to areas that offer high levels of retail penetration. We have noted an upturn in the number of community retail developments in locations such as Juffair, while larger shopping malls, such as the BD 45 million ‘The Avenues’, are being seen as game changers for the Kingdom’s retail scene.We expect some 78,015 sqm of new retail space to be delivered across Bahrain this year, increasing to approximately 93,000 sqm in 2018 and in excess of a further 455,000 sqm by 2020. Separate to the development of retail malls, the Gulf’s largest IKEA is on track to open next year at a cost of BD 47 million and is expected to create up to 600 new jobs.” Cluttons research highlights that the depth of developers’ confidence in the sector is reflected in the fact that it is currently tracking 21 retail schemes, spread across more than 1.05 million sqm, at a total cost of over BD 277 million. All projects are due to be completed between now and the start of 2020.Harry Goodson-Wickes, Head of Cluttons Bahrain and Saudi Arabia, said, “The desirability for developers to select existing communities for new schemes has also been fuelled by the strong penetration of retail developments in many of Bahrain’s established residential areas. An example of this is the Marassi Boulevard, which consists of four low-rise buildings, with over 240 homes, alongside 700 sqm of retail and access to a 2km private beach and waterfront promenade. The success of the development is likely to be further enhanced by its proximity to the 180,000 sqm high-end Marassi Galleria retail development. We expect the development’s position, adjacent to Amwaj Islands, in addition to the strong community infrastructure being provided, is likely to result in keen interest from both buyers and tenants.”Residential MarketCluttons report shows that after rents retreated across the board at the start of the year, the market appears to be entering a period of stability, with average rents across the Kingdom firming during Q3. Rents in general have weakened by an average of 16.2% when compared to this time last year, and are down by roughly 8% since the start of 2017. In general, villas have outperformed apartments, however rents have dipped by 11% over the last 12 months. On the apartment front, rental rates in Juffair have experienced some of the sharpest corrections.Goodson-Wickes commented, “For more than 18 months now, we have highlighted the risk of oversupply of apartments in Juffair and we appear to have reached a tipping point, where supply has exceeded demand. That said, with roughly 5,000 units being completed each year, there may be the potential for these units to be absorbed by domestic buyers, provided they are priced under BD 120,000 in order to qualify for a social housing loan. As it stands, the Ministry of Housing has a social housing waiting list of approximately 55,000, so demand appears as though it may exceed supply. However, many of the schemes currently under development are geared towards the luxury end of the price spectrum. Oversupply remains an area of concern and something we continue to monitor closely.”Commercial MarketAccording to Cluttons Bahrain report, elsewhere in the Kingdom’s commercial market, demand for office space remains lacklustre and static, with a very limited number of enquiries. Encouragingly, rents for both fitted and shell and core space have remained stable since the start of 2017. This is in part linked to the sharp rent corrections that have been recorded since 2010; shell and core space is down by roughly 40-70%, while rents for fitted space are down by a third to half over the same period.While overall demand remains weak, start-up businesses are active in the market. Additionally, the only noteworthy activity amongst international occupiers has been Amazon’s decision to make Bahrain a regional hub for its cloud computing services, which will see the creation of three data centres in the Kingdom by 2019.Outlook for 2018Cluttons report shows that aside from the clear risks to overall demand levels for both residential and commercial property that stem from any further weakness in oil prices, a number of downside risks are being monitored, including value added tax (VAT) and infrastructure levy.While Saudi Arabia and the UAE have forged ahead with plans for VAT, commencing on 1 January 2018, Bahrain is yet to declare its intentions on the formal roll out of a VAT regime. The implications of VAT in Bahrain are likely to be a spike in inflation, which may dent consumer confidence and spending. This would, of course, come in addition to the gradual erosion of state food and energy subsidies, placing household finances under further strain. The impact on the property market is still unclear, but if the Kingdom followed in the footsteps of the UAE by taxing all commercial sales and lease transactions, demand is likely to weaken further, driving down rents from their current low levels. However, if the Kingdom follows the Saudi Arabian authorities’ decision to tax buy-to-let residential property, there is likely to be a weakening in Bahrain’s second homes market.Goodson-Wickes concluded, “While our expectation is for rents to remain firm this year, the retail market is expected to remain a bright spot in the Kingdom’s property market. 2018 is likely to see rental rates remaining firm once more as more supply comes online to match anticipated demand. The residential rental market in Bahrain, however, is likely to remain stable for the remainder of 2017 and to continue this stability into 2018, as the market absorbs the falls registered this year. This is, of course, predicated on the residential market being exempt from any form of VAT. As for the commercial market, the sharp corrections that have occurred in recent years have driven rents to all-time lows. This is why our view for 2017 is for flat growth, while 2018 may well see further falls in headline asking rates should VAT be imposed on the commercial office market, as is the case elsewhere in the GCC.”-Ends-

Tweet 
Shares of Liberty Broadband Corporation (NASDAQ:LBRDK) have earned an average broker rating score of 3.00 (Hold) from the one analysts that provide coverage for the stock, Zacks Investment Research reports. One investment analyst has rated the stock with a hold recommendation. 
Analysts have set a 1 year consensus target price of $98.00 for the company and are forecasting that the company will post $0.02 earnings per share for the current quarter, according to Zacks. Zacks has also assigned Liberty Broadband Corporation an industry rank of 174 out of 265 based on the ratings given to its competitors. Get Liberty Broadband Corporation alerts: 
A number of analysts have commented on LBRDK shares. Morgan Stanley restated an “equal weight” rating and set a $95.00 price target (up from $91.00) on shares of Liberty Broadband Corporation in a research report on Monday, July 17th. Zacks Investment Research downgraded shares of Liberty Broadband Corporation from a “hold” rating to a “sell” rating in a report on Thursday, July 20th. Finally, TheStreet downgraded shares of Liberty Broadband Corporation from a “b” rating to a “c+” rating in a report on Wednesday, August 16th. 
In related news, Director John C. Malone sold 45,000 shares of the business’s stock in a transaction that occurred on Monday, October 23rd. The shares were sold at an average price of $93.32, for a total value of $4,199,400.00. The transaction was disclosed in a legal filing with the Securities & Exchange Commission, which can be accessed through the SEC website . Also, Director John C. Following the completion of the sale, the director now owns 3,418,279 shares in the company, valued at $324,292,128.73. The disclosure for this sale can be found here . Insiders sold a total of 208,520 shares of company stock worth $20,103,353 over the last quarter. Insiders own 10.80% of the company’s stock. 
Several institutional investors have recently added to or reduced their stakes in the company. posts.title: Al Masraf opens a new branch in Abu Dhabi s Mussafah Industrial Zone
posts.text:
#financial services | 07 November, 2017 Al Masraf opens a new branch in Abu Dhabi’s Mussafah Industrial Zone Press Release Arab Bank for Investment and Foreign Trade “ Al Masraf ” celebrated the inauguration of its newest branch in Abu Dhabi’s Mussaffah Industrial Zone. In order to strengthen its presence in the Emirate of Abu Dhabi 
Arab Bank for Investment and Foreign Trade “ Al Masraf ” celebrated the inauguration of its newest branch in Abu Dhabi’s Mussaffah Industrial Zone. The opening ceremony was attended by Mr. Faisal Galadari , the Chief Executive Officer in addition to members of senior management of Al Masraf . 
The new branch, which will be managed by Yousif Kruse who has extensive banking experience, will provide innovative products and services for the small and medium enterprises as well as a full range of retail banking services. Commenting on the opening of the new branch, Faisal Galadari , the Chief Executive Officer at Al Masraf said “Opening the new branch comes in line with our efforts to strengthen our presence in the Emirate of Abu Dhabi which we considered a vibrant and growing market. In this context, opening the branch in this new location would implement the plans of Al Masraf aiming to improve all services provided to the Clients”.
He added “Opening Mussafah Branch in its new location is part of Al Masraf’s expansion strategy aiming to enhance the network of branches in the main areas to provide its clients with the best banking solutions. The new branch reflects Al Masraf’s constant commitment to keep up with state-of-the-art banking technologies and offer integrated digital banking channels that can be used easily. This would eventually enrich our customers’ banking experience”. Advertisement Yousif Kruse, Head of Small & Medium Enterprises of Al Masraf, said “The commercial sector is considered a fundamental pillar of economic growth in the United Arab Emirates, which drives us to continue our effort to maintain our leading position in serving this sector. The new branch would help to fulfill the financial needs of the small and medium business enterprises in Mussafah”.
It is noteworthy that Al Masraf has launched lately a new application for smartphones and furthermore, signed a strategic partnership with Temenos, a banking software company, to strengthen its capabilities to introduce innovative products. 
-Ends-

posts.title: 国土资源部“三稀”重点实验室挂牌-财经频道-
posts.text:
证券时报网（www.stcn.com）11月07日讯
国土资源部网站7日消息，国土资源部稀土稀有稀散矿产勘查及综合利用重点实验室建设验收工作近日在武汉举行。
经过以中国科学院院士李廷栋为组长的专家组评定，实验室以96分的成绩通过建设验收。国土资源部科技与国际合作司司长姜建军、湖北省国土资源厅巡视员徐振坤、湖北省地质局局长朱厚伦出席重点实验室建设验收会，并共同为重点实验室揭牌。
实验室围绕着稀土稀有稀散元素物质组分、稀土稀有稀散元素分析方法及应用两个研究方向，通过承担国家、省部级等各类项目开展攻关创新研究，取得了重要进展，并取得了良好的应用效果，经济和社会效益明显。获各类奖项共计27项，其中省部级奖励6项，湖北省厅局级奖励21项；公开发表学术论文35篇；授权4项专利，其中发明专利1项、实用新型专利3项；研发了8个国家一级标准物质；制定了12个行业分析技术标准。成为我国稀土稀有稀散元素分析技术领域的重要创新平台。
（证券时报网快讯中心）

thread.title: AVRAM IANCU, bibliotecarul român nominalizat la titlul de ÎNOTĂTORUL ANULUI pe plan mondial
thread.title_full: AVRAM IANCU, bibliotecarul român nominalizat la titlul de ÎNOTĂTORUL ANULUI pe plan mondial

posts.author: Z.P.
posts.title: AVRAM IANCU, bibliotecarul român nominalizat la titlul de ÎNOTĂTORUL ANULUI pe plan mondial
posts.text:
România are, în premieră, un român nominalizat la categoria ÎNOTĂTORUL ANULUI în ape libere, de către World Open Water Swimming Association (California, SUA). Avram Iancu, bibliotecarul în vârstă de 41 de ani, este prima persoană din lume care a înotat toată lungimea Dunării (2860 de kilometri) fără costum de protecție, reușind această performanță în 89 de zile.
România are, în premieră, un român nominalizat la categoria ÎNOTĂTORUL ANULUI în ape libere, de către World Open Water Swimming Association (California, SUA).
Avram Iancu, bibliotecarul în vârstă de 41 de ani, este prima persoană din lume care a înotat toată lungimea Dunării (2860 de kilometri) fără costum de protecție, reușind această performanță în 89 de zile.
“Nu pot să spun decât că mă simt onorat și fericit că o astfel de performanță a reușit să stârnească ecouri nu doar în România și Europa ci și în Statele Unite, iar nominalizarea vine să-mi confirme că reușita mea a fost, într-adevăr, una excepțională. Am încredere că voi câștiga și că voi fi desemnat Înotătorul Anului pe plan mondial, dar acest lucru poate fi posibil numai cu sprijinul românilor, pentru că avem de-a face cu un sistem de votare public. Se poate vota pe https://www.worldopenwaterswimmingassociation.com/2017-wowsa-awards/ ”, declară Avram Iancu.
Avram Iancu este primul român din istorie care ajunge pe lista nominalizărilor World Open Water Swimming Association alături de alți 12 sportivi din întreaga lume, fiecare cu performanțe răsunătoare. Nominalizările sunt realizate de un juriu format din antrenori și foști campioni la concursuri ce presupun înotul în ape libere.
Câștigătorul va fi anunțat pe 1 ianuarie 2018 printr-o ceremonie care va avea loc în California, Statele Unite ale Americii.
Steven Munatones, fost întotător profesionist de maraton, apreciat instructor, membru de onoare în International Marathon Swimming Hall of Fame și fondator al organizației World Open Water Swimming Association, spune despre performanța lui Avram Iancu:
"Avram și-a depășit orice limite în timpul celor 89 de zile și a făcut față unor condiții nefavorabile de mediu pe care nu le anticipase. Prin performanța sa, Avram a ajuns la sufletul a sute de mii de persoane, care au rămas impresionați de personalitatea lui, ambiția si determinarea de care a dat dovadă. Și-a câștigat astfel nominalizarea la categoria Înotătorul Anului pe plan mondial".
Avram Iancu este, de altfel, și primul român care a traversat înot Canalul Mânecii, pe 30 august 2016, fără să poarte costum de neopren, la capătul unui efort continuu de 17 ore și 54 de minute în care a parcurs 62 de kilometri.
Până în prezent, alte două persoane au reușit să străbată înot Dunărea, de la izvoare până la vărsarea în Marea Neagră. Primul este slovenul Martin Strel, care, în anul 2000, a înotat timp de 58 de zile în Dunăre, ajutându-se de un costum de neopren și labe de înot. Șase ani mai târziu, canadianca Mimi Huges a terminat același traseu, după 90 de zile, echipată cu un costum de neopren, dar fără labe de înot.

posts.title: Houghton Mifflin Harcourt Company (HMHC) Raised to “Sell” at ValuEngine
posts.text:
Tweet 
ValuEngine upgraded shares of Houghton Mifflin Harcourt Company (NASDAQ:HMHC) from a strong sell rating to a sell rating in a report issued on Saturday morning. 
A number of other brokerages have also recently commented on HMHC. Stifel Nicolaus reaffirmed a hold rating and set a $12.50 price target on shares of Houghton Mifflin Harcourt in a research report on Monday, July 10th. Zacks Investment Research raised Houghton Mifflin Harcourt from a hold rating to a buy rating and set a $13.00 price target on the stock in a research report on Thursday, July 20th. BidaskClub cut Houghton Mifflin Harcourt from a hold rating to a sell rating in a research report on Wednesday, July 12th. BMO Capital Markets reissued a hold rating and set a $13.00 price objective on shares of Houghton Mifflin Harcourt in a report on Friday, August 4th. Finally, Morgan Stanley dropped their price objective on Houghton Mifflin Harcourt from $12.00 to $11.00 and set an equal weight rating on the stock in a report on Monday, October 23rd. Two analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating, five have given a hold rating and one has given a buy rating to the company’s stock. The stock presently has an average rating of Hold and an average target price of $13.08. Get Houghton Mifflin Harcourt Company alerts: 
Houghton Mifflin Harcourt ( HMHC ) opened at $9.75 on Friday. Houghton Mifflin Harcourt has a 1 year low of $9.20 and a 1 year high of $13.95. The company has a current ratio of 1.38, a quick ratio of 1.10 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.94. 
Houghton Mifflin Harcourt (NASDAQ:HMHC) last issued its quarterly earnings results on Thursday, November 2nd. The business services provider reported $0.73 EPS for the quarter, beating analysts’ consensus estimates of $0.54 by $0.19. Houghton Mifflin Harcourt had a negative return on equity of 17.37% and a negative net margin of 18.59%. The firm had revenue of $532.00 million for the quarter, compared to analysts’ expectations of $528.40 million. During the same quarter in the prior year, the firm earned $0.73 EPS. The business’s revenue for the quarter was down .2% compared to the same quarter last year. equities research analysts anticipate that Houghton Mifflin Harcourt will post -1.69 earnings per share for the current year. 
A number of institutional investors and hedge funds have recently modified their holdings of HMHC. Karp Capital Management Corp purchased a new stake in Houghton Mifflin Harcourt during the 1st quarter worth about $169,000. Parametric Portfolio Associates LLC increased its stake in Houghton Mifflin Harcourt by 57.8% in the 1st quarter. Parametric Portfolio Associates LLC now owns 137,123 shares of the business services provider’s stock worth $1,392,000 after acquiring an additional 50,237 shares during the last quarter. Alliancebernstein L.P. increased its stake in Houghton Mifflin Harcourt by 1.1% in the 1st quarter. Alliancebernstein L.P. now owns 207,800 shares of the business services provider’s stock worth $2,109,000 after acquiring an additional 2,197 shares during the last quarter. California Public Employees Retirement System increased its stake in Houghton Mifflin Harcourt by 21.7% in the 1st quarter. California Public Employees Retirement System now owns 189,100 shares of the business services provider’s stock worth $1,919,000 after acquiring an additional 33,700 shares during the last quarter. Finally, Legal & General Group Plc increased its stake in Houghton Mifflin Harcourt by 18.1% in the 1st quarter. Legal & General Group Plc now owns 50,540 shares of the business services provider’s stock worth $512,000 after acquiring an additional 7,740 shares during the last quarter. 99.83% of the stock is currently owned by institutional investors and hedge funds. 
Houghton Mifflin Harcourt Company Profile 
Houghton Mifflin Harcourt Company (HMH) is a global learning company, specializing in education solutions across a range of media. The Company operates through two segments: Education and Trade Publishing. As of December 31, 2016, the Company delivered content, services and technology to both educational institutions and consumers, reaching over 50 million students in approximately 150 countries across the world.

thread.title: Sukaldeetako aitzindaria
thread.title_full: Sukaldeetako aitzindaria

posts.author: Goierriko Hitza
posts.title: Sukaldeetako aitzindaria
posts.text:
07 azaroa, 2017 Asteko Gaia 112 
Bilboko, Bizkaiko eta Euskal Herriko goi sukaldaritzaren aitzindarietako bat izan zen Florentina Intxausti Irizar (Gabiria, 1887 – Tanger, Maroko, 1944). Baserritik irtenda zerbitzari hirira joan, jakinminak eta ikasteko irrikak gastronomiaren muinetara sarrarazi, eta Bilbon Sukaldaritza Akademiak eta jatetxe apartekoenak izatera iritsi zen. 
Gabiriako Igeribarrazpikoa baserrian jaio zen Florentina Intxausti, 1887ko martxoaren 14an. Mende aldaketarako kaskoko Alkain etxera aldatua zen familia, eskuineko bizitzara. 19 urterekin sortetxea utzi, eta Bilbon neskame hasi zen, hainbat familiatan. Harik eta Txabarriko markesaren jauregira —gaur egun Espainiako Gobernuaren ordezkaritza da— iritsi zen arte: hango sukaldari frantziarrak erakutsi zizkion sukaldearen sekretuak. 
Ramon Prellezo kantabriarrarekin ezkondu —Euskalduna antzokiko maitrea—, eta Argentinara joan ziren, 1912 aldera. Esneki denda bat eduki zuten, Buenos Airesen. Lau seme-alabetatik bi han izan zituzten. 1919an Bilbora itzuli ziren, eta orduan hasi zen izarren karrera. 
Hiru akademia 
Jatetxea zabaldu zuten Bilbon, Iturribide 30ean. Handik gutxira (1920), Florentina sukalde-eskolak ematen ere hasi zen, eta Sukaldaritza Akademia ireki zuten. Pisua txikiegi geratu, eta hurrengo urtean Colon de Larreategi kaleko 27ra eraman zituzten bi negozioak. Sukaldaritza klaseez gain, postregintza ere ematen zuen. 
Bilboko goi burgesiaren begiko akademia bihurtu zen Florentinarena. Familia dirudunek hara bidaltzen zituzten alabak, ezkontzen zirenerako sukal-dean ondo molda zitezen. 
Denbora gutxian, egundoko entzutea lortu zuen. Bizkaian lehenbizikoa izango zen errezeta-liburua argitaratu zuen 1925ean, haren ikasleek animatuta. Lau edizio izan ditu. 
Gabiriatik bi ahizpa ere eraman zituen, ugaltzen zihoakion lanean laguntzeko: Maria Isabel gazteena lehenik, eta gurasoak hil zirenean, Victoriana. 
Akademia eta jatetxea berriz aldatu beharrean suertatu ziren. Hirugarren kokagunea Elkano kaleko 3an izan zuen, behin betikoa. Han egokitu zuten Elkano jatetxe-taberna, 300 metro koadroko behealdean. Kafetegi-taberna, jantokia eta sukalde zabalean bertan akademia zituen. 8 suko txapa bat zen sutokia, egurrez eta ikatzez elikatua. Inguruan elkartzen zituen ikasleak. Bilboko Sukaldari Akademiako ikasleekin. Florentina, eserita, eskuinetik hirugarrena da; haren senar Ramon Prellezo, zutik, ezkerretik lehena; eta ahizpa Maria Isabel Intxausti, zutik, ezkerretik bosgarrena. 
EAJ eta erregea, bezero 
Espainiako errege-erregina Alfontso XIII.a Borboikoa eta Victoria Eugenia Battenberg Bilbora etorri ziren batean, 1923ko uztailaren 31n, Florentina Intxausti aukeratu zuen Areetako Real Club Sporting elkarteak ohorezko bazkaria jartzeko. Zazpi platereko oturuntza prestatu zuen, kutsu frantziar nabarmenekoa. 
Elkano jatetxea Bilboko gorenetakoa zen. EAJko buruzagiek han egiten zituzten isilpeko bilerak 1936ko gerraren aurretik, jatetxeko baina zuzeneko igarobiderik ez zuen erreserbatu-areto batean. Athleticeko jokalari taldea ere joan ohi zen, kontzentrazioetan, jatera. Florentinak 1943an utzi behar izan zion lanari, bihotzeko osasun arazoak agertu zitzaizkiolako. Hurrengo urtean hilko zen, 1944ko urriaren 15ean, Tangerren, hara Iluminada alabarenera joana baitzen. 
Maria Isabel Intxausti ahizpak eta haren senar Juan Etxebarrietak hartu zuten negozioa. Haiek ere akademia-jatetxean ezagutu zuten elkar. Obra batzuk egin, eta 1945ean ekin zioten Elkano taberna-jatetxearen aro berriari. Urrezko garaia izan zen hura ere, 1969ko maiatzean erabat itxi zuten arte. 
Jatorri xumetik iritsita, aurkeztu zitzaion aukera baliatuta, eta lana beltz eginda, arrakastazko karrera egin zuen Florentina Intxaustik Sukaldaritza Akademian eta egundoko harrera ona zeukan jatetxean. Hala ere, ia erabat ezezaguna da haren figura, lana eta kemena bai Gabirian, bai Goierrin, baita euskal sukaldaritzan ere. Lau argitalpen izan ditu Intxaustik idatzitako lehen errezeta liburuak 
Gastronomiari buruz Bizkaian lehenengo argitaratutako liburua Florentina Intxaustirena izan zen. ‘Libro de cocina’ izenburu generikoarekin atera zion Lersundi etxeak, 1925ean. Bigarren argitalpena 1930ean izan zuen, hirugarrena 1944an (Graficas Mercurion). Bere akademiako ikasleek eta jarraitzaileek eskatuta argitaratu zuela aitortu zuen, eskaintzan. 
Bilboko Udalak sustatuta, 2007ko abenduan laugarren edizioak argia ikusi zuen. Bilbao 700 Fundazioak eta Muelle de Uribitarte argitaletxeak egin zuten azken liburua, 1925ekoaren berrikuspena. 
Azken liburuak 170 orrialde ditu, Iñaki Azkuna alkatearen sarrerarekin eta Jesus Llona Larrauri gastronomoaren hitzaurrearekin. Errezetak 16 sailetan banatuta aurkeztu zituen Intxaustik. Guztira, 401 plater eman zituen. Haragien sailekoak dira ugarienak, ia arrainenak bezainbeste. Gozogintza ere jorratu zuen, pasteletatik hasi eta gelatina edo izozkietaraino. Sukaldaritza frantziarraren eragina nabarmena da, baita italiarrarena ere. Ukitu ingeles batzuk ere ageri ditu.

thread.title_full: Review: IOTransfer – iPhone Manager Software

posts.author: Klaus
posts.title: Review: IOTransfer – iPhone Manager Software
posts.text:
IOTransfer is a Windows program that is one the best iPhone manager software . It helps you transfer your content from iOS and iPhone devices as you wish. You can easily manage the content of all Apple devices, not just the content of a single device. You can upload your iPhone data to iPad and iPod and even transfer the contents of all your devices to your PC.
Managing photos, music, videos on your iPhone and transferring your computer will never been easier.
Once you have set up the program to be active, you will also need to download the iTunes software. Insert USB cable that will connect your PC to your iPhone or other device when IOTransfer is open.
IOTransfer General Features and Highlights Two Way Transfer: Transfer photos, music, videos, etc. back and forth from iOS devices and computer without any limitation.
Bulk Transfer with One Click: Simply transfer all content from iPhone / iPad / iPod touch directly to Windows computer with a simple click.
Secure Bulk Deletion: Deletes all unwanted files in a safe manner and leaves no cache files behind.
Protect Your Best Moments with IOTransfer With IOTransfer, you can back up your best moments and keep them where you want them. As the best iPhone photo manager, you are always secured. You can transfer and synchronize all your photos from your iPhone and iPad to your computer in no time. You can also transfer your favorite pictures from your computer to iPhone without using iTunes or iCloud.With just one click, you can transfer photos to PC to back up your photos to your computer and free up your iPhone space. With IOTransfer, you can always Share the moment you want with your loved ones.

Manage Your iPhone / iPod Music as You Want with IOTransfer. IOTransfer is one of the best music transferring tools for iPhone as well as for photography. The iPhone makes it extremely easy to transfer music from your iPod, iPad, and PC. If you want to transfer your songs to PC, you can delete or keep them from your phone. With batch song transfer mode you spend more time on transferring, while you spend more time enjoying music on different devices. You can access and share your favorite music with your friends and family at your will. Your computer allows you to transfer downloaded music to your iPhone, iPod, or iPad without using iTunes.
IOTransfer Provides You the Taste of Videos and Movies With IOTransfer, you can transfer your videos or movies from your iPhone or iPad by dragging and dropping them onto a computer. Record your favorite videos anywhere you want. You can easily transfer iPhone video to your computer to enjoy all the videos and movies on different Apple devices. Transfer and play your entire media content simply and quickly.
Back up IPhone Data and Restore as you Want With IOTransfer, you can back up all your iPhone data by transferring it to a computer. Avoid deleting any erroneous data by regularly backing up, avoiding the loss of all your data in the event of a damaged or stolen iPhone. In addition to transferring photos, music, videos, IOTransfer; guides, messages, applications, podcasts, books, voice notes, etc. can also be back up and once you need them, you can safely transfer all your backups back to your phone.
Pro’s 
One of the Fastest iOS File Sync software for Windows system IOTransfer made ‘File Transfer in iOS devices’ as simple as Android file Sync Quickly Sync files between iOS device and PC or iTunes or two iOS devices App helps to manage & Sync files including Music, Video, Photo, Apps, Podcasts, iBooks & Voice Memos Getting access to iOS files from PC was never so easy & Fast Powerful Search tool to find out desired contents in seconds Con’s 
Trial version has some limitation in number of files sync per day App might add more information regarding connected iOS device on Home screen Application requires fixing issue with older iOS devices while using App Sync Why is the IOTransfer file manager the best among alternatives? Simplicity and functionality; there are no unnecessary buttons, an intricate interface, and certainly more time-consuming operations. Once you make use of IOTransfer, you won’t want to open iTunes anymore, because you can virtually do all the necessary actions with the help of IOTransfer, and much faster.
The program IOTransfer is available for free download as well as paid version.

thread.title: Силистренски учителки докоснаха антиматерията
thread.title_full: Силистренски учителки докоснаха антиматерията

posts.author: Paralel_44
posts.title: Силистренски учителки докоснаха антиматерията
posts.text:
вторник, ноември 7th, 2017 | Paralel_44 Силистренски учителки докоснаха антиматерията 
Преподавателките по информатика и информационни технологии Искра Николова от ПМГ „Св. Климент Охридски” и Диана Жекова ПГСУАУ «Атанас Буров» от Силистра посетиха централата на ЦЕРН в Женева, Швейцария. Там те участваха в едноседмично обучение за учители по международната програма „Квалификация на педагогическите специалисти”. Бяха единствените наши представителки сред общо 39 свои колеги от цялата страна, избрани за обучението след предварителна селекционна процедура. 
Всички бяха посрещнати от българските учени в ЦЕРН, които се отнесоха към тях с голямо внимание и уважение. Показаха им най-големия ускорител на елементарни частици в света – големият адронен колайдер, дълъг 27 км и разположен на 100 метра под земята. Заведоха ги в Центъра за идеи „Ideasquare”, където стаите са преносими и където има двуетажен автобус за учените, които мислят по-добре в движение. Разясниха им функциите на суперкомпютрите, на технологиите „Grid” и „Cloud” и на новите програми за управление и анализ на медицински данни. През свободното време ги запознаха с местните забележителности, включително Двореца на нациите и централата на Червения кръст. 
В ЦЕРН работят около 2500 учени от целия свят, които изпълняват 4 основни мисии: разширяване границите на познанието, намиране на приложения на научните открития чрез нови технологии, подготовка на бъдещи учени и международно сътрудничество. Те търсят отговори на въпросите за тайните на Големия взрив и за това как е изглеждала материята в първите мигове от съществуването на Вселената, какво е маса, как е придобита, защо някои елементарни частици нямат маса, от какво са направени 96% от Вселената, какво представляват тъмната материя и тъмната енергия. 
ЦЕРН е уникален и с това, че там са най-високите и най-ниските температури, най-високата степен на вакуум, най-високоскоростната писта на елементарни частици. Едно от нещата, което впечатли нашите педагози, беше разглеждането на CMS /Compact Muon Solenoid/-детектора, намиращ се също на 100 метра под земята. Те изпитаха основателна гордост от факта, че българи са направили повечето части за този детектор, който има задачата да установява наличието на различни елементарни частици. Наблюдаваха движението и траекторията на такива частици в специалната лаборатория „S’COOL LAB“ или тъй наречената „Камера на Уилсън”. 
В периода от 2008 до 2017 г. над 600 учители от България са преминали през такава квалификация, в която сега имаха щастието да се включат Николова и Жекова. Според тях пребиваването им в ЦЕРН трудно може да се опише с думи, понеже е било нещо невероятно. То им е дало голям тласък да продължат да работят в посоката, в която са поели, желаейки да „запалят” учениците си по модерната наука и да ги направят по-любознателни. Така техните възпитаници ще могат да подобрят резултатите си в училище и да продължат своето обучение в инженерната и природоматематическата област. 
ЦЕРН е емоция и видиш ли го на живо, му ставаш посланик за цял живот, споделиха двете учителки. Коментирайте
